mapper.select: SELECT (CASE WHEN COURSE.COURSE_DAY = #{courseDay} AND COURSE_PERIOD = #{coursePeriod} THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) ANSWER_YN FROM TB_PROFESSOR_REG PROFESSOR INNER JOIN TB_COURSE COURSE ON COURSE.COURSE_CODE = PROFESSOR.COURSE_CODE WHERE PROFESSOR.USER_CODE = #{userCode}

SELECT PROFESSOR.PROFESSOR_REG_CODE , PROFESSOR.COURSE_CODE , COURSE.COURSE_NAME , COURSE.COURSE_SCORE , COURSE.COURSE_CATEGORY_CD , (SELECT COMM_CD_NM FROM TB_COM_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND COMM_TY_CD = 'CODE0102' AND COMM_CD = COURSE.COURSE_CATEGORY_CD) AS COURSE_CATEGORY_CD_NM , COURSE_CLASSROOM , COURSE_DAY , COURSE_PERIOD , NVL((SELECT SUM(COURSE.COURSE_SCORE) FROM TB_PROFESSOR_REG PROFESSOR INNER JOIN TB_COURSE COURSE ON COURSE.COURSE_CODE = PROFESSOR.COURSE_CODE WHERE 1 = 1 AND PROFESSOR.USER_CODE = #{userCode}), 0) AS COURSE_TOTAL_SCORE FROM TB_PROFESSOR_REG PROFESSOR INNER JOIN TB_COURSE COURSE ON COURSE.COURSE_CODE = PROFESSOR.COURSE_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND PROFESSOR.USER_CODE = #{userCode}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_PROFESSOR_REG WHERE 1=1 AND PROFESSOR_REG_CODE = #{professorRegCode}
DELETE FROM TB_PROFESSOR_REG WHERE 1=1 AND COURSE_CODE = #{courseCode}
